amendment.description: Amendment requires the Executive agency to display a list of any regulatory actions that duplicate or overlap with agency regulatory action.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-21 to require the Executive agency to display a list of any regulatory actions that duplicate or overlap with agency regulatory action.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farenthold amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 263 - 145 (Roll no. 123).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Farenthold.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Farenthold amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 263 - 145 (Roll no. 123).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
